intro: Get ready to stretch your brain and your belly — the cutest lunchbox puzzle is back with even more satisfying challenges!
description:
Say hello to Neko Bento 2 — a flavor-packed puzzle experience where lunch is still cute, but now even trickier to pack!

This time your favorite feline chef is back with even more riddles to solve! You thought you knew it all? Think again because these levels with brand new ingredients and shapes will put your spatial brain to the test.

Although the challenge has risen, you don’t have to worry too much about that. You may have as much time as you like to complete a puzzle.

What will Neko Bento 2 serve you?
- Over 90 levels to eat up.
- 29 various ingredients to organize - pay attention to their shapes, it’s crucial…
- Music track that will help your mind focus and lock in!
- Artwork that will win your taste over… and not only the music one.

Chefs tend to be impatient, so don’t wait for too long and become the ultimate bento master!
